msg: On the dont-save-plaintext-passwords-by-default branch, fix a crash.
Also, simplify the implementation of svn_auth_plaintext_prompt_func_t
callbacks by moving user answer caching into the function calling the
save_credentials callback. No new API rev required.
is now only called once per authentication realm, not once per
inside the callback anymore. We're not being called more than
(svn_auth_save_credentials): Pass a pool to save_credentials that
survives across RA sessions. This is what fixes the crash.
to cache answers to the plaintext password saving prompt across RA

author: stsp
msg: not storing plaintext passwords when not interactive, since the
password is usually supplied on the command line anyway in this case.
The configuration file is heeded in non-interactive mode though,
